right.text: "Sure, you were walking kind of slowly, and your eyes were glazed from lack of sleep, but did that weird guy with the cow on his shirt REALLY have to nail you in the head with a shotgun?"

left.text: Ok, hows this for a storyline.

right.text: No, Dr_Dos, that would be your kind of lame game.

left.text: "Nadir has a dildo and goes around assraping the people, and I and the fellow #loungeacters have to stop him"

right.text: Alright, Dos. You're either going to shut the fuck up right now or you can piss off.

left.text: "After fighting through hordes of Nadir clones you make it to Nadir's citadel, where you have to defeat the evil computer Kracken to gain entry."
